first_paragraph: Hi there! I'm a 17-year-old web developer passionate about programming and web design. My main focus is on creating functional web pages with an attractive design and clean, readable code.
second_paragraph: As a full-stack developer, I have skills in both front-end and back-end development. This means that I can create the structure and functionality of the web page, as well as design the user interface and user experience. Additionally, I can configure servers to make the web pages available online for everyone.
third_paragraph: I strive to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development to ensure that my web pages are always modern and relevant.
fourth_paragraph: If you need a web developer who focuses on quality and efficiency, don't hesitate to get in touch with me! I'm always willing to work on new projects and excited to see how I can help you achieve your online goals.
technology_stack: I use the technologies most demanded by the market in web development. Full stack: server administration, front-end and back-end.
todo_list: This application is developed in React and has several useful features, including a messaging chat, a to-do list, and a calendar.
